targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(namespace, pod, container, name, component, participant) (rate(daml_executor_runtime_duration_seconds{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container="$container", name=~"$name"}[$__rate_interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(namespace, pod, container, name, component, participant) (rate(daml_executor_runtime_idle_duration_seconds{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container="$container", name=~"$name"}[$__rate_interval])))

options.content:
# Common Executor Service Metrics

Executor Service Metrics that are common between thread pools and fork join pools.
These metrics are outsourced from the Executor Service itself.
